availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: E. N. Berryman (Anderson County, Kentucky, merchant)

body.p: Anderson County, Kentucky, merchant. Kentucky native. Merchant in Woodford County, Kentucky, in 1850. Married Sarah J. Willis Berryman in May 26, 1851. Father of Willis Berryman and Theressa Berryman. Cones merchant in Anderson County in 1860.

bibl.p: Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Woodford County, District 1, p. 428. Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Anderson County, p. 89. Kentucky, County Marriages, 1783-1965, Ancestry, Woodford County, Kentucky, May 26, 1851. KYR-0001-029-0565.
